description: Adds or updates tags for a resource in CodeArtifact.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource that you want to add or update tags for.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The tags you want to modify or add to the resource. (dict) --- A tag is a key-value pair that can be used to manage, search for, or filter resources in CodeArtifact. The tag key. The tag value.
